title: Process a Disability Waiver of Premium Claim
description: A policyholder has become totally disabled and is filing a claim to have their life insurance premiums waived.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and verify their policy includes a Waiver of Premium rider.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the policy has the required rider.

tasks.description: Request medical records and an Attending Physician's Statement to prove total disability as defined in the policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the customer the required forms and a list of necessary documents.

tasks.description: Once the claim is approved, set the policy to waive all future premium payments.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent approves the claim and updates the policy status to 'Premium Waived'.
